alert.note: Alert for Cottonwood; Lincoln; Lyon; Murray (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 2:27PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lincoln, Lyon, Murray and Cottonwood Counties. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially along and east of the highest elevations of the Buffalo Ridge. Use caution while traveling, as visibility could change rapidly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Also watch for significant drifting of freshly fallen snow, which could impact travel.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
